Minecraft.description:
Minecraft server with selectable version.

Based on a custom OCI image, available for amd64 and arm64 architecture.

/data.description: Share for the Minecraft server data; including configuration, mods, etc.
/data.label: Data storage [e.g. minecraft-data]

EULA.description: You must accept the EULA for Minecraft for the server to run.
EULA.label: EULA Accept [e.g. TRUE]
